msbt.message: I've got a surprise for you, !BOOM! Prezzie!
Hey, umI know this is, like, out of nowhere. But I want you to have my !
Hi, ! Are you maybe looking for ?
I'm really hoping you'll take my off my hands.I totally have more than I need already. What do you say, ?
Check it out! It's !Pretty awesome, huh? But, you knowif it's not your thing, no big.
! It's for my bestie! Andthat's you!Super fab, right? I hope you think so too! Enjoy!
The thing isafter I bought this, an amazing friend gave me... the exact same thing! Can you believe it?
I don't need it anymore, and I'd just chuck itBut I'd hate for folks—especially, like, my fans—to think that I don't, you know, recycle.So I hope my bestie—that's you, —can be my recycle buddy!
If you don't end up using this, it's totally fine if you give it away. I'm just glad to get it off my hands!
Ohfor real? I wonder who I heard that from?Well, whatever! You can still have it. Consider it a gift!

Really? Must've been somebody else.Oh well. You know how you're always doing nice things for me, ?The other day, I couldn't help buying .And now I can't help giving it to you! It'd make me soooo super happy if you'd accept it!
Recycling gifts is, like, a tradition in my family. So if you don't want this, just give it to somebody else!
Try it out and see if you like it! Think of it as a big thanks from your bestie!
If you decide you don't want ityou should, you know, give it to someone else! Make them feel super fabulous!
